thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Kazakh KMG EP GDR buyback offer declared unconditional

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Kazakh KMG EP GDR buyback offer declared unconditional
text:
ALMATY, Jan 23 (Reuters) - Kazakh oil producer KazMunaiGas Exploration and Production (KMG EP) on Tuesday declared its offer to purchase its own global depository receipts unconditional, another step towards its delisting.
The offer had previously been conditional on receiving acceptances from 39.4 percent GDR holders. As of Jan.22, about 87 percent accepted the offer, KMG EP said in a statement. KMG EPâ€™s delisting could pave way for the listing of its parent firm, state-owned National Company KazMunayGaz.
Reporting by Olzhas Auyezov; editing by Katya Golubkova
